lead_paragraph: Florida announced on Thursday that for the first time mosquitoes in Miami Beach had tested positive for the virus, showing the virus was still active in the area.

byline.contributor: Lizette Alvarez contributed reporting from Miami.

headline.print_headline: Tests Confirm Mosquitoes in Miami Beach Carry Zika
headline.main: Tests Confirm Mosquitoes in Miami Beach Are Carrying Zika Virus

snippet: Florida announced on Thursday that for the first time mosquitoes in Miami Beach had tested positive for the virus, showing the virus was still active in the area....
abstract: Florida health officials announces mosquitoes in Miami Beach have tested positive for Zika virus, confirming virus is still active in area.
